name: Request Smuggling Scanner
description: Detects HTTP Request Smuggling vulnerabilities (CL.TE, TE.CL, TE.TE)
author: Dominator Team
cwe_name: Inconsistent Interpretation of HTTP Requests ('HTTP Request/Response Smuggling')
remediation: Use HTTP/2 end-to-end. Normalize Content-Length and Transfer-Encoding handling. Use same server software on frontend and backend.
